main.name: Kyle Cheung
main.description: In the business of turning ideas into realities
main.bio: I am currently a Computer Science student at the University of Western Ontario with a passion for learning. I am an aspiring Full-Stack Developer with experience in a variety of skills and am continuously experimenting with the newest technologies. I specialize in web development using React and Javascript, I am also experienced in traditional languages like Java, Python, C++. I am committed to delivering clear and concise code.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.description: Data Structures & Algorithms, Operating Systems, Discrete Mathematics, Linear Algebra, Databases, Computer Networks, Software Design & Analysis, Artificial Intelligence, Software Tools, & Systems Programming

work.title: Contract Web Developer
work.description: Contracted to develop a Progressive-Web-App using React. I was in charge of building the app from the ground up and styling it using CSS and Javascript.

work.title: I.T. Technician
work.description: I was responsible for conversing with clients and troubleshooting technical problems as smoothly as possible. I learned how to explain complex concepts as simply as possible as well as learning how to use administrative software to remotely help clients as well.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
